item.title: HackTheBox - Cronos Writeup w/o Metasploit
item.description: HackTheBox - Cronos Writeup w/o Metasploit Introduction Cronos is a HackTheBox retired machine. It is a Linux box, and has been officially rated as medium in difficulty, although I feel the machine is quite easy. Let’s jump in. Reconnaissance General Enumeration We’ll start out with an nmap scan. I always start with a quick initial scan. Command: nmap -Pn -n -oN nmap/initial 10.10.10.13 Output: We can see that from the top 1000 ports only three are open:
